title: Customizing Box Plots
description: Make and analyze two box plots. One box plot should select two columns(bill_depth_mm, bill_length_mm) and show outliers. The other should select two columns (bill_depth_mm, bill_length_mm) and hide outliers. If you need a reminder of the header names and data, look over the penguins.csv dataset.
hint: Drag in the select columns action block. This block should be placed before the box plot action block. After the box plot action, add the show outliers action Run the program to explore the box plot. To explore the other box plot, stop the program, replace the show outliers action with the hide outliers action, and run the program.
